name: Ryan Brown
bio: Ryan Brown is a dynamic Right Wing known for his blistering pace and audacious footwork. Raised in the vibrant streets of Miami, he embodies the fierce spirit of Everglade FC, dazzling fans with every touch. His left foot sends chills down defenders' spines, making him a constant threat. A true team player, Ryan thrives on the big stage, often taking it upon himself to turn the tide in tight matches.
